response.overview: Journey into the multi-faceted world of DVD.  The Ultimate DVD offers you a unique entertainment experience, featuring reference quality sights and sounds designed to fully exploit your system's capabilities.  Indulge your senses with some of the most breath-taking visuals ever captured on film.  Immerse yourself in state-of-the-art high resolution audio and digital surround sound.  Sit back, relax and enjoy the "ultimate home theater sensation!"
response.tagline: Complete Home Theater Enhancement, Set-Up & Diagnostic Tools
response.title: The Ultimate DVD Platinum
